name: Corksy
author: Brightspot, BrandClick

sections.description:
Corksy is an ecommerce solution for the winery industry. 

Whether you are launching a new winery or taking an existing winery online, corksy provides powerful features to do e-commerce right. Any themes suited for your business can be used with this plugin to create an efficient store front giving customers great user experience.  

All Features

  • Store front 
  • Viewing products by collection
  • Signing up or checkout as guest 
  • Signup for subscription 
  • Book wine tasting event
  • order management 
  • Profile management 
  • Reward points program integration 
  • Quick signup for payment processing 
  • Verifying shipment compliance to all states of USA
sections.faq:
How do I get help for the Corksy plugin?

If you are struck, you can get help from support@corksy.io

Will the Corksy plugin work with my theme?

Yes! Croksy will work with any theme but may require some additional styling.

Where can I report bugs?

You can report bugs to support@corksy.io

Where can I request new features?

Yes, you can request new features to support@corksy.io

My question is not listed here, where can I find more answers?

You can get more answers from support@corksy.io
